formula.name: 4th Imag Quasi Perpendicular / Heart
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = 4 * Xr * abs(Xi * Xr2 - Xi * Xi2) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * xr2 * xi2 + cr; xin = 4 * (xr) * abs( - Xi2 * Xi - 3 * xi * Xi2 + Xr2 * Xi + 2 * xr * Xr * Xi - 3 * xi2 * Xi + xr2 * Xi + xi * Xr2 + 2 * xr * xi * Xr - xi2 * xi + xr2 * xi) + 4 * Xr * diffabs( - Xi2 * Xi + Xr2 * Xi, - 3 * xi * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xr * Xi - 3 * xi2 * Xi + xr2 * Xi + xi * Xr2 + 2 * xr * xi * Xr - xi2 * xi + xr2 * xi) + ci;
